column1: #dig Common stair/shaft digging for all floors below surface/depot levels. I like to start by digging this several blueprint Z-levels deep, then going back to overlay specific floor templates. This is easy with e.g. Alt+R (repeat), 10, down. If you want to install the waterfall system, do not dig this blueprint on the Z-level just below the depot; leave that level for the top level of waterfall plumbing. We always dig out the topleftmost tile (even if miners can't access it yet) to give us an easy top-left reference point for future QF builds.
